org.vanilladb.core.query.algebra

Class SelectPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanilladb.core.query.algebra.ReduceRecordsPlan
      • org.vanilladb.core.query.algebra.SelectPlan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Plan

    public class SelectPlan
extends ReduceRecordsPlan
    The Plan class corresponding to the select relational algebra operator.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SelectPlan(Plan p, Predicate pred)
      Creates a new select node in the query tree, having the specified subquery and predicate.

    • Method Detail

      • predHistogram

        public static Histogram predHistogram(Histogram hist,
                                      Predicate pred)
        Returns a histogram that, for each field, approximates the distribution of field values from the specified histogram satisfying the specified predicate.

        Assumes that:

        • Equality selection always finds matching records
        • Values in a bucket have the same frequency (uniform frequency)
        • Given values within two equal ranges (of two joinable fields), all values in the range having smaller number of values appear in the range having larger number of values
        • Distributions of values in different fields are independent with each other
        Parameters:
        hist - the input join distribution of field values
        pred - the predicate
        Returns:
        a histogram that, for each field, approximates the distribution of field values satisfying the predicate

      • constantRangeHistogram

        public static Histogram constantRangeHistogram(Histogram hist,
                                               Map<String,ConstantRange> cRanges)
        Returns a histogram that, for each field, approximates the distribution of values from the specified histogram falling within the specified search range.

        Assumes that:

        • Equality selection always finds matching records
        • Values in a bucket have the same frequency (uniform frequency)
        • Distributions of values in different fields are independent with each other
        Parameters:
        hist - the input histogram
        cRanges - a map from fields to search ranges
        Returns:
        a histogram that, for each field, approximates the distribution of values from the specified histogram falling within the specified search range

      • constantRangeBucket

        public static Bucket constantRangeBucket(Bucket bkt,
                                         ConstantRange cRange)
        Creates a new bucket by keeping the statistics of records and values in the specified bucket falling within the specified search range.

        Assumes that:

        • Equality selection always finds matching records
        • Values in a bucket have the same frequency (uniform frequency)
        Parameters:
        bkt - the input bucket
        cRange - the search range
        Returns:
        a new bucket that keeps the statistics of records and values falling within the specified search range

      • joinFieldsHistogram

        public static Histogram joinFieldsHistogram(Histogram hist,
                                            Set<String> group)
        Returns a histogram that, for each field, approximates the distribution of values from the specified histogram joining with other fields in the specified group.

        Assumes that:

        • Values in a bucket have the same frequency (uniform frequency)
        • Given values within two equal ranges (of two joinable fields), all values in the range having smaller number of values appear in the range having larger number of values
        • Distributions of values in different fields are independent with each other
        Parameters:
        hist - the input histogram
        group - the group of joining fields
        Returns:
        a histogram that, for each field, approximates the distribution of values from the specified histogram joining with other fields in the specified group

      • joinFieldBucket

        public static Bucket joinFieldBucket(Bucket bkt1,
                                     Bucket bkt2,
                                     double numRec)
        Creates a new bucket by keeping the statistics of joining records and values from the two specified buckets.

        Assumes that:

        • Values in a bucket have the same frequency (uniform frequency)
        • Given values within two equal ranges (of two joinable fields), all values in the range having smaller number of values appear in the range having larger number of values
        • Distributions of values in different fields are independent with each other
        Parameters:
        bkt1 - the input bucket 1
        bkt2 - the input bucket 2
        numRec - the total number of records in the histogram where bkt1 and bkt2 belong to
        Returns:
        a new bucket that keeps the statistics of joining records and values from the two specified buckets
